howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: A simple 3-step method to transform your relationship with money.

step1.title: Define your trajectory
step1.description: Create your budgets and goals based on your priorities.

step2.title: Log your expenses
step2.description: A few seconds per transaction for real awareness.

step3.title: Ritualize your tracking
step3.description: Guided rituals to anchor lasting habits.

features.title: No automation that turns you into a mere spectator
features.description: With Steero, you become the pilot: you understand, adjust, and ritualize your financial trajectory to reach the destination you've chosen.

budget.title: Budget
budget.description: Your resources are limited: they allow you to build the present and prepare for the future. Defining them well is essential. Create clear budgets with the trajectory, our intuitive tool that guides you to define your destination.

capture.title: Log
capture.description: Unlike other apps, Steero doesn't do it for you. Manual logging creates an emotional connection: which significantly improves self-regulation… We've enhanced it with the Level - The budget gauge that shows what's spent, spent with the entry, and remaining.

ritualize.title: Ritualize
ritualize.description: Financial understanding doesn't rely solely on knowledge, but on behavioral habits. Conscious repetition is a key factor in lasting change. Rituals tell you what to do, what to look at, what questions to ask yourself, and how to prepare for what's next.

differentiation.title: A unique approach
differentiation.description: Discover what makes Steero different from other apps.

whySteero.heroDescription: A different approach to financial management, based on understanding, consistency, and lasting change.
whySteero.missionP1: Steero was born from a simple observation: personal finance apps automate everything, but don't change your behavior.
whySteero.missionP2: Our mission is to help you develop a real understanding of your financial management, not just a tool to view automatically generated charts.
whySteero.quote: True financial freedom comes from understanding, which is born and strengthened through action, not automation.
whySteero.alternativesDescription: Solutions that promise a lot, but don't really change your habits.
